Where exactly is this?\""},{"lineNumber":243014,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おはよう、ようやく起きたわね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good morning, you finally woke up.\""},{"lineNumber":243015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ、ワーグ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, Warg?\""},{"lineNumber":243016,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんでお前がこっちの世界に……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why are you in this world...\""},{"lineNumber":243017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私の家だもの。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is my home after all.\""},{"lineNumber":243018,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そりゃ私がいるわよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course I would be here.\""},{"lineNumber":243019,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んん？　おかしいぞ、俺達、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? both~.\""},{"lineNumber":243038,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えへへへ、いつの間にか寝てたみたい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe, I guess I fell asleep without realizing see...\""},{"lineNumber":243040,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":243041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王様のボーイフレンドの名前って","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's Good job, Warg!\""},{"lineNumber":243062,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……髪がグシャグシャになる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...My hair's getting all messed up.\""},{"lineNumber":243063,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頭を撫でないで」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't pat my head.\""},{"lineNumber":243064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーい、ほめられたー。うれしいー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay, I got praised. I'm so happy!\""},{"lineNumber":243065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　二人ともどうしたの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? What's wrong with you two?\""},{"lineNumber":243066,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":243067,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":243068,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと美樹が城の廊下を、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and Miki walk down the castle hallway,"},{"lineNumber":243069,"originalJapaneseLine":"仲むつまじく手を繋ぎながら歩く。","translatedEnglishLine":"hand in hand, happily together."},{"lineNumber":243070,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでね、それでね、ランスくん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And then, and then, Rance-kun."},{"lineNumber":243071,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのうしさんのお箸がとっても可愛いの。」","translatedEnglishLine":"Those cow chopsticks are really cute.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ？　ああ？　ここはいったい？」
「おはよう、ようやく起きたわね」
なんでお前がこっちの世界に……
元の世界に戻ったんじゃ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...should have returned to the original world..."
"I see, so everything until now was just a dream..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 随分と長いこと寝ていたから勘違いしてた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was mistaken because I slept for quite a long time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ていたのは五分くらいだけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You only slept for about five minutes though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれだけの冒険してたったの五分か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After such an adventure, it was only five minutes..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前……すごい力持ってるな……」
「力を褒められても嬉しくないわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not happy to be praised for power."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより、大事なのは魔王様よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, the Demon Lord is what's important."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 記憶の中を大冒険も面白かったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The great adventure within memories was fun, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんの記憶が変わってなきゃ意味が――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It means nothing if Miki-chan's memories haven't changed—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えへへへ、いつの間にか寝てたみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe, I guess I fell asleep without realizing it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王様のボーイフレンドの名前って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's the name of the Demon Lord's boyfriend again?"
"No, I was just a little curious..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなの健太郎くんに決まってるでしょ？」
「変なの？　ボーイフレンドの名前間違えるなんて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that weird? Getting the boyfriend's name wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「美樹ちゃんのボーイフレンドの名前は？」
大成功だ！　偉いぞ、ワーグ！」
「わーい、ほめられたー。うれしいー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yay, I got praised. I'm so happy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと美樹が城の廊下を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Miki walk down the castle hallway,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲むつまじく手を繋ぎながら歩く。
「それでね、それでね、ランスくん。
そのうしさんのお箸がとっても可愛いの。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those cow chopsticks are really cute."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ？　ああ？　ここはいったい？」
「おはよう、ようやく起きたわね」
なんでお前がこっちの世界に……
元の世界に戻ったんじゃ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...should have returned to the original world..."
"I see, so everything until now was just a dream..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 随分と長いこと寝ていたから勘違いしてた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was mistaken because I slept for quite a long time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ていたのは五分くらいだけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You only slept for about five minutes though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれだけの冒険してたったの五分か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After such an adventure, it was only five minutes..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前……すごい力持ってるな……」
「力を褒められても嬉しくないわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not happy to be praised for power."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより、大事なのは魔王様よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, the Demon Lord is what's important."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 記憶の中を大冒険も面白かったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The great adventure within memories was fun, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんの記憶が変わってなきゃ意味が――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It means nothing if Miki-chan's memories haven't changed—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えへへへ、いつの間にか寝てたみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe, I guess I fell asleep without realizing it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王様のボーイフレンドの名前って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's the name of the Demon Lord's boyfriend again?"
"No, I was just a little curious..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなの健太郎くんに決まってるでしょ？」
「変なの？　ボーイフレンドの名前間違えるなんて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that weird? Getting the boyfriend's name wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「美樹ちゃんのボーイフレンドの名前は？」
大成功だ！　偉いぞ、ワーグ！」
「わーい、ほめられたー。うれしいー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yay, I got praised. I'm so happy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと美樹が城の廊下を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Miki walk down the castle hallway,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲むつまじく手を繋ぎながら歩く。
「それでね、それでね、ランスくん。
そのうしさんのお箸がとっても可愛いの。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those cow chopsticks are really cute."
